title: (x) Roy Lichtenstein comic book style font - P22 Pop Art Comic {Stephen}
content:
Hello everyone! Can you help me? I'm trying to find a font which is similar to Roy Lichtenstein's great writing (font). Thanks in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [roy1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120110102054/http:/typophile.com/files/roy1.jpg) | 77.36 KB |
| [roy2.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20120110102054/http:/typophile.com/files/roy2.JPG) | 58.68 KB |
| [roy3.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20120110102054/http:/typophile.com/files/roy3.jpg) | 51.03 KB |
author: imoverthere

comments.content: [P22 Pop Art Comic](http://web.archive.org/web/20120110102054/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/p22/p22_pop_art_comic/?sample_text=IMAGE%20DUPLICATOR) was directly based on Lichtenstein's letters. It's super close on everything but the 'I's.
Great! Thank you very much for your help!
